name: Eagle's Emergency
description:
Disclaimer

Please read known bugs section to be aware. The game is just a prototype yet so bugs are present in a natural order.

Game

This is a 3-5 min long prototype of an ambitious stealth-horror game inspired by The Thing (1982), Among Us and SCP universe.

Made for Horror Game Jam in 7 days. Theme ~ Isolation.

Authors

Daniil Elfin & Ilyas Faizullin.

Credits

- Retro Texture Pack by Little Martian

- Press Start 2P Font by CodeMan38

- Simple Keys pack by beamedeighth 

- Music icons by Freepik - Flaticon

- Game poster contains an artwork by RAMAN DJAFARI and BANGERS font by Vernon Adams

Known bugs (Jam version)

- Please play the game at 60 or 75 fps for best experience. Higher or lower rates could break the game!
